definition: estimated by comparison, an animal or plant that bears a relationship to another (as related by common descent or by membership in the same genus)
details:
adjective
- estimated by comparison
= synonyms: comparative
- properly related in size or degree or other measurable characteristics
= synonyms: proportional
noun
- an animal or plant that bears a relationship to another (as related by common descent or by membership in the same genus)
= synonyms: congeneric
- a person related by blood or marriage
= example: a person related by blood or marriage
= synonyms: relation
